Comment: ChatGPT/AI can be a good jumping off point, but they shouldn't be relied on for things like this.    Best/Worst presidents is entirely subjective and opinion based. If you asked 100 people you'd get 100 different lists. Since there's no cohesive answer to the question for AI to find, it's answers are going to vary wildly based on minor variations in the prompt.   You could probably get it to put Harrison at #1 if you framed the question the right way.
